Accepted upgrade on QF7 (Sydney to Dallas) from economy class to business class on 4 October 2013.
Accepted upgrade on QF2 (London to Sydney) from economy class to business class on 18 October 2013.
I have entered into an agreement with Allen & Unwin Pty Ltd to write a book, for which I have received an advance payment and will receive royalties.
Myself and three others attended a briefing and training session hosted by Surfing Australia over a 3 day period from 22nd to 24th November 2013.
Accepted five tickets to the NRL Match on Friday 14th March, 2014 (Brisbane Broncos vs North QLD Cowboys) in a corporate suite hosted by the Former Origin Greats (FOGS)
Accepted transport (private car hire) and one night accommodation to provide keynote presentation at CFO Summit on 16th March 2014
Accepted flights from Gold Coast to Canberra on 17th March (Gold Coast to Sydney - QF861 - Business class) (Sydney to Canberra - QF1419 - Economy class)

Accepted return economy airfares to London from the Centre for American Progress to attend a meeting of the Inclusive Prosperity Commission to which I have been appointed a commissioner. (Sydney to London Friday 28th February 2014 on QF1) (London to Sydney Tuesday 4th March 2014 on QF2)
Accepted accommodation for three nights in London to attend a meeting of the Inclusive Prosperity Commission to which I have been appointed a commissioner
Accepted speaker's fee on 1 April 2014 for delivering a Keynote presentation at CFO Summit on 16 March 2014

Accepted return business airfares to Jakarta, Indonesia, flying Garuda Airlines, to attend the Asia-Pacific Outreach Meeting on Sustainable Development Financing. This included private transfers to and from the airport in Jakarta.
Accepted two nights' accommodation at Hotel Borobudur Jakarta to attend the Asia-Pacific Outreach Meeting on Sustainable Development Financing.
Admission to events at the 25th Annual Byron Bay Bluesfest from 18-21 April, 2014, for myself and wife.
Accepted return economy airfares from Sydney to New York to attend the final meeting of the Inclusive Prosperity Commission, through the Centre for American Progress
Accepted two night's accommodation in New York to attend the final meeting of the Inclusive Prosperity Commission, through the Centre for American Progress
Accepted four tickets to the National Press Club address on Monday 18 August 2014
Accepted a gift of membership to the National Press Club, a pen and a bottle of Penfolds Bin 407 Cabernet Sauvignon from the National Press Club
I accepted return economy flights from Brisbane to Melbourne (16-18 September) and airport transfers to take part in two events for The Wheeler Centre
I accepted two nights' accommodation at Sofitel Melbourne by The Wheeler Centre (16-18 September)

Accepted return business airfares to Jakarta, Indonesia, flying Garuda and Virgin airlines, to attend the Asia-Pacific High-Level Consultation on Financing for Development. This included private transfers to and from the airport in Jakarta.
Accepted two nights accommodation at Hotel Borobudur Jakarta to attend the Asia-Pacific High-Level Consultation on Financing for Development Conference.
Purchased family holiday home at Maroochydore, Queensland.
I have received an allowance to meet expenses incurred whilst preparing a report for ESCAP on a growth agenda for development in the Asia-Pacific Region.

disclosures.entity: Singapore and Ethiopian Airlines and Thai Airways
disclosures.details: Accepted return business airfares to Addis Ababa, Ethiopia, from United Nations Economic and Social Commission for Asia and the Pacific (ESCAP), flying Singapore and Ethiopian Airlines and Thai Airways, to attend the Third International Conference on Financing for Development. This included private transfers to and from the airport in Addis Ababa.

Accepted two nights' accommodation at the Friendship International Hotel Addis Ababa to participate in two side events "Financing for Transformation: From Agenda to Action on Sustainable Development in Asia and the Pacific" and "Regional Perspectives on Implementing on Ambitious, Transformative Sustainable Development Agenda".
I have received an allowance to meet expenses incurred whilst preparing a series of seminars for the Jackson Institute for Global Affairs.
Admission to events at the Annual Byron Bay Bluesfest, for myself and wife.
